name: Operation: W73
description: After you discover what was hidden on W72, they offer you another job, this time, not a simple project, but a whole operation. The problem being that they arranged your failure. They sent you to a small planet which looks to have deadly plants that are growing bigger and bigger, leaving you without space on the planet. Collect as many assets as possible from the planet and go out as fast as possible. Although by the end something doesn't quite go right.
